system.requirement: When you craft a mystic amulet of one type below, roll +wits. On a strong hit, X is 2. On a weak hit, X is 1.

abilities.description: Lotus: When you @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.ironswornmoves.Item.e09e2fc8bb709320]{Endure Stress}, add +X. If your action die shows a one. the amulet's magic is spent.
Beads: When you @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.ironswornmoves.Item.fdb51ee928b4fca2]{Endure Harm}, add +X. If your action die shows a one, the amulet's magic is spent.
Om: When you Learn From Failure. you may reroll up to X dice. If either die shows a ten, the amulet's magic is spent.
